testcase.name: TC01_Validation of OrderId which is created and displayed
testcase.system-out: Given User launch browser and open the Adactinhotel WebPage.................passed When User enters the valid userName and passWord............................passed And User Click on login Button..............................................passed Given User Verify the SearchHotel Page is displayed.........................passed When User Select Valid Details of Location,Hotel,RoomType,Number of Rooms, and enters the CheckIn Date ,CheckOut Date and Select the Adult Room ,ChildRoom.passed Then User Click on Submit Button............................................passed Then User Verify the Select Hotel Page is Displayed.........................passed And User click the Select Radio Button and click the Continue Button.......passed Then Useer Verify the Book A Hotel Page is displayed........................passed When User enter the Valid FirstName,LastName,Billing Address,CreditCardNo and Select CreditCardType,Expiry Month,Expiry Year and Enter Valid Cvv.passed And User click the Book Now Button.........................................passed Then User verify the OrderId is displayed...................................passed

testcase.name: TC02_Validation of Adactin WebPage with different credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User launch browser and open the Adactinhotel WebPage.................passed When User enters the valid userName and passWord............................passed And User Click on login Button..............................................passed Given User Verify the SearchHotel Page is displayed.........................passed When User Select Valid Details of Location"Sydney",Hotel"Hotel Creek",RoomType"Standard",Number of Rooms"1 - One", and enters the CheckIn Date ,CheckOut Date and Select the Adult Room"1 - One" ,ChildRoom"0 - None".passed Then User Click on Submit Button............................................passed Then User Verify the Select Hotel Page is Displayed.........................passed And User click the Select Radio Button and click the Continue Button.......passed Then Useer Verify the Book A Hotel Page is displayed........................passed When User enter the Valid FirstName"Ranjith",LastName"kumar",Billing Address"Coimbatore",CreditCardNo"1234567890123456" and Select CreditCardType"American Express",Expiry Month"January",Expiry Year"2022" and Enter Valid Cvv"321".passed And User click the Book Now Button.........................................passed Then User verify the OrderId is displayed...................................passed
